===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[dwarf]]
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} describes a hairstyle for women that was popular during the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]] in which the hair was gathered up in a lopsided bun.
# {{lb|zh|historical|now|pejorative}} [[Japan]]; [[Yamato]]
# {{lb|zh|historical|now|pejorative}} [[Japanese]]
# [[dwarfish]], [[short]]
